label: theta_s = arcsin(125/288) approx 25.72 degrees
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
import math
reg = get_registry()

# Use registry values
ROOTS = reg.roots_total         # 288
visible = reg.visible_sector    # 125

# Sterile angle: theta_s = arcsin(visible / ROOTS)
theta_s_rad = math.asin(visible / ROOTS)
theta_s_deg = theta_s_rad * 180 / math.pi
result = round(theta_s_deg, 4)  # 25.7234
note: Gate 8: Tilt required to view matter from 26D bulk
